text: SI units & computers: petabyte 289k ghits, exabyte 908k ghits, zettabyte 92k ghits, yottabyte 359k ghits. Beyond yotta: lots-a-bytes!
SI units & DNA: kilobase: 457k ghits, megabase 257k, gigabase 419k, terabase 8660, +petabase 90, nothing relevant for exabase and above.
@golda Each gamete has 750 megabytes, actually. http://tinyurl.com/ychd3k8 (Avoided MB to avoid confusion with megabase)
